University of Macau: The University of Macau (UM or UMac;[note 1] Portuguese: Universidade de Macau; Chinese: 澳門大學) is a public research university in Macau. The university campus is located in the east of Hengqin Island, Guangdong province in Mainland China, on a piece of land leased to the Government of Macau, and is under the jurisdiction of Macau.
